Set the depth to 0.75 and leave the opposite depth at 0.0. Scale the sketch by 0.75 and use the NewBodyFeatureOperation to create a new body, resulting in the creation of the prism. Part 2 Create a second three-dimensional rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. Begin by creating a new coordinate system. Set the depth to 0.7286 and leave the normal depth at 0.0.
